title: The long national nightmare is over
author: VD
content_html:
Vikings fire Tice
Owner announces decision just after win over Bears

Huzzah. A year late is better than never. And by the way, I can’t even tell you how much I love Flutie’s drop kick. That is the ultimate in old skool cool.
content_text:
Vikings fire Tice
Owner announces decision just after win over Bears
Huzzah.  A year late is better than never.  And by the way, I can’t even tell you how much I love Flutie’s drop kick.  That is the ultimate in old skool cool.
